availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Todd County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Roscoe and Emily Dickinson. Married to Sarah Dickinson. Farmer in Todd County in 1860.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Todd County, District no. 1, p. 233A. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Todd County, p. 755. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Todd County, Trenton Precinct, p. 448. Vital Statistics Original Death Certificates â€“ Microfilm (1911-1964), KDLA, Roll #7016161, All County Deaths. Find A Grave, "Spiller Harris Dickinson (1838-1914)," Memorial #94366727, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/94366727 (accessed September 13, 2018).
